article.description: Mount St. Mary's, Md. 72, St. Francis, Pa. 61
article.headline: Mount St. Mary's, Md. 72, St. Francis, Pa. 61
article.linkText: Mount St. Mary's, Md. 72, St. Francis, Pa. 61
article.story: LORETTO, Pa. (AP) -- Jeremy Goode and Jean Cajou scored 18 points apiece to lead Mount St. Mary's to a 72-61 win over St. Francis, Pa. on Saturday night. Mount St. Mary's (14-14, 10-7 Northeast Conference) never trailed and took control with an 11-0 run in the first half. Cajou came off the bench to hit three 3-pointers during the run to give the Mountaineers a 30-16 lead. Mount St. Mary's led by 17 at the half, and St. Francis (6-21, 4-12) drew no closer than 11 the rest of the way. Chris Vann scored 17 points and Markus Mitchell had 10 for Mount St. Mary's. Chris Berry tied a career high with 25 points for St. Francis, which has lost six of seven. Cale Nelson added 11 points for the Red Flash.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
